

######################################

oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_guided = {
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_inquisitive_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_inquisitive = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_narrow_minded }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_narrow_minded_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_statecraft = {
    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    has_base_skill >= 4

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_observant = {
    OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer
			has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
		}
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_maniacal = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky = {
    has_paragon_dlc = no

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_maniacal_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_maniacal = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			leader_class = scientist
			has_leader_flag = renowned_materialist1
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid_2 }
}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_charismatic = {
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_army_veteran = {
    is_pool_leader = yes # Starting trait only.

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = "leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer" } }
    NOT = { has_trait = selectable_weight = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = weight = @shared_trait_weight }
    NOT = { has_trait = inline_script = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = script = "paragon/existing_specific_trait_weight_mult" }
    NOT = { has_trait = TRAIT = leader_trait_army_veteran }
    NOT = { has_trait = } }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_space_miner = {
    has_governor_subclass = yes
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_robotist = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				has_technology = tech_robotic_workers
				has_cybernetic_ascension = yes
				is_individual_machine = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_feedback_loop = {
    is_gestalt = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		exists = owner
		owner = { country_uses_food = yes }
		is_pool_leader = yes # Starting trait only.

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_particles = {
    is_specialist_researcher_physics = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_academic_astral_rift_expert = {
    has_astral_planes_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_scholar
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    
    owner = {
        ['tech_rift_sphere }\n\tselectable_weight = {\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/subclass_free_trait_weight\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/pilot_weight_mult\n\t\tinline_script = {\n\t\t\tscript = paragon/subclass_weight_mult\n\t\t\tSUBCLASS = scientist_scholar\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\talways = yes\n\t\t\tfactor = value:trait_selectable_weight_per_rift_completed\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = {\n\t\t\t\tis_dimensional_worship_empire = yes\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = { is_hyperspace_specialty_empire = yes }\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = { has_origin = origin_riftworld }\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n']
    }
}

    leader_class = scientist

		NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_eager }

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_shroud_preacher = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		from = {
			NOT = {
				has_origin = origin_mindwardens
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = mindwarden_commander
		}
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_charismatic_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_charismatic = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies = {
    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}
		has_ancrel = yes
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				has_origin = origin_remnants
				has_ascension_perk = ap_archaeoengineers
				any_system_within_border = {
					any_archaeological_site = {
						is_site_completed = yes
					}
				}
				any_owned_planet = {
					has_active_building = building_archaeostudies_faculty
				}
			}
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_expansionist_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_expansionist = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_academic_minor_artifacts_expert = {
    has_ancrel = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_scholar
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    
    owner = {
        ['tech_archaeostudies }\n\tselectable_weight = {\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/subclass_free_trait_weight\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/pilot_weight_mult\n\t\tinline_script = {\n\t\t\tscript = paragon/subclass_weight_mult\n\t\t\tSUBCLASS = scientist_scholar\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = {\n\t\t\t\thas_ascension_perk = ap_archaeoengineers\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n']
    }
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_venerated = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_psionics = {
    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}
		OR = {
			has_psionic_leader_trait = yes
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					OR = {
						has_technology = tech_psionic_theory
						has_origin = origin_shroudwalker_apprentice
					}
				}
			}
			species = {
				has_psionic_species_trait = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_meticulous_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_meticulous = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_carefree }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_carefree_2 }
}

    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_materials = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_assembler = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				is_gestalt = yes
				has_technology = tech_robotic_workers
			}
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_explorer_cloaking_focus = {
    has_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
    
    owner = {
        ['tech_cloaking_1 }\n\tleader_potential_add = {\n\t\thas_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer\n\t\thas_paragon_dlc = yes\n']
    }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_environmental_engineer = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			has_blocker_removal_tech = yes
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_entrepreneur = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_consumer_goods = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_biology = {
    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_salvager_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_salvager = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_food = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_prospector = {
    has_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_physics_focus_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_physics_focus = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_military_theory = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_engineering_focus_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_engineering_focus = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_bureaucrat = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_meticulous = {
    is_ruler = no

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_carefree }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_carefree_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_academic_dig_site_expert_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_academic_dig_site_expert = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_capitalist = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_spark_of_genius = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid_2 }
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_venerated = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_space_miner = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    is_specialist_researcher_physics = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_naturalist = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_roamer = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_neurotic }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_neurotic_2 }

    OR = {
			is_gestalt = no
			AND = {
				is_gestalt = yes
				is_councilor = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}

		}

		has_ancrel = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    is_ruler = no

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_meticulous }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_meticulous_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_neurotic }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_neurotic_2 }
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_slippery_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_slippery = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_archaeologist = {
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_science_communicator_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_science_communicator = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_materials = {
    is_specialist_researcher_engineering = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_custom_AI_assistant = {
    leader_class = scientist
    
    owner = {
        ['tech_self_aware_logic }\n\topposites = { "leader_trait_sapient_AI_assistant" }\n\tselectable_weight = {\n\t\tweight = @class_trait_weight\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/pilot_weight_mult\n\t\tinline_script = {\n\t\t\tscript = paragon/dual_subclass_weight_mult\n\t\t\tSUBCLASS_1 = scientist_explorer\n\t\t\tSUBCLASS_2 = scientist_scholar\n\t\t}\n']
    }
    NOT = { has_trait = "leader_trait_sapient_AI_assistant" } }
    NOT = { has_trait = selectable_weight = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = weight = @class_trait_weight }
    NOT = { has_trait = inline_script = paragon/pilot_weight_mult }
    NOT = { has_trait = inline_script = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = script = paragon/dual_subclass_weight_mult }
    NOT = { has_trait = SUBCLASS_1 = scientist_explorer }
    NOT = { has_trait = SUBCLASS_2 = scientist_scholar }
    NOT = { has_trait = } }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_propulsion = {
    is_specialist_researcher_engineering = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_slippery = {
    has_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_salvager_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_salvager = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_truth_seeker = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_biology_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_biology = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_manufacturer = {
    OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
		}
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_sapient_AI_assistant = {
    NOT = { from = { has_policy_flag = ai_outlawed } }

    leader_class = scientist
    
    owner = {
        ['tech_sapient_ai }\n\topposites = { "leader_trait_custom_AI_assistant" }\n\tselectable_weight = {\n\t\tweight = @class_trait_weight\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/pilot_weight_mult\n\t\tinline_script = {\n\t\t\tscript = paragon/dual_subclass_weight_mult\n\t\t\tSUBCLASS_1 = scientist_explorer\n\t\t\tSUBCLASS_2 = scientist_scholar\n\t\t}\n']
    }
    NOT = { has_trait = "leader_trait_custom_AI_assistant" } }
    NOT = { has_trait = selectable_weight = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = weight = @class_trait_weight }
    NOT = { has_trait = inline_script = paragon/pilot_weight_mult }
    NOT = { has_trait = inline_script = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = script = paragon/dual_subclass_weight_mult }
    NOT = { has_trait = SUBCLASS_1 = scientist_explorer }
    NOT = { has_trait = SUBCLASS_2 = scientist_scholar }
    NOT = { has_trait = } }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_entrepreneur = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_industry = {
    is_specialist_researcher_engineering = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_planar_theorist = {
    has_astral_planes_dlc = yes
		is_heir = no
		is_ruler = no

    leader_class = scientist
    
    owner = {
        ['tech_rift_sphere }\n\tselectable_weight = {\n\t\tweight = @class_trait_weight\n\t\tinline_script = paragon/council_weight_mult\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\talways = yes\n\t\t\tfactor = value:trait_selectable_weight_per_rift_completed\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = {\n\t\t\t\tis_dimensional_worship_empire = yes\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = { is_hyperspace_specialty_empire = yes }\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tfrom = { has_origin = origin_riftworld }\n\t\t\tfactor = @synergy_weight_mult\n\t\t}\n\t\tmodifier = {\n\t\t\tis_heir = yes\n\t\t\tfactor = 0\n\t\t}\n']
    }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_inquisitive = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_narrow_minded }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_narrow_minded_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer = {
    is_pool_leader = yes # Starting trait only.

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = "leader_trait_army_veteran" } }
    NOT = { has_trait = selectable_weight = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = weight = @shared_trait_weight }
    NOT = { has_trait = inline_script = { }
    NOT = { has_trait = script = "paragon/existing_specific_trait_weight_mult" }
    NOT = { has_trait = TRAIT = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer }
    NOT = { has_trait = } }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_industrialist_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_industrialist = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds = {
    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
		can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_observant_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_observant = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_collaborator = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_opinionated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_opinionated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_academic_dig_site_expert = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_scholar
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_great_researcher = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_assembler = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_space_miner = {
    has_paragon_dlc = no

    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_official_economy_councilor
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_engineering_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_engineering_focus = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_mediator = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_governor_subclass = yes
		has_ethic = ethic_xenophile

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_void_tracker = {
    has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
		exists = from
		FROM = {
			has_technology = tech_gravity_wells
		}

    leader_class = scientist
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_military_theory = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_particles = yes
    leader_class = scientist

    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4

    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_voidcraft = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_carefree_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_carefree = yes
    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_meticulous }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_meticulous_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_neurotic }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_neurotic_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_spark_of_genius = {
    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_private_mines = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding = {
    leader_class = scientist
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = scientist
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_statecraft_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_statecraft = yes
    leader_class = scientist
}
